reviews.review: its a ddecent game im just nto good at it lol

It has some of the most unique experiences a person could have in a videogame, of course the gameplay itself is pretty good but that's not the star of the show, it's the player base. Only in games like these can you: get yelled at by a lebanese man, get crushed by a 12 year old who calls you a n00b in chat, meet your best friend, be put against a team of spinbotters with furry profile pictures and have one dude that just decided to play the violin instead of the game.


The game truly has it all

Look at my playtime. So what do you think? You're thinking "lol this guy spent so much time in this game, he should be really good!", right? YOU WOULD THINK I WOULD LEARN ONE THING BESIDES RUSSIAN SWEARWORDS AND TO FIGURE OUT HOW THE CONTROLLS WORK AND WHAT THE PREFIXES LIKE "GG", "GL", "GR", "NS" (havent heard that since 1945 lol) and "SUCA BLYAT RUSH B" MEAN. 

10 outta 10 angry russians, would beat my table again.

PS: Found out I can play pretty good being stoned. So that isn't a problem anymore. Stay green.
